name: Crappy Olympics games by Orazio Cacciola
name_original: Crappy Olympics games by Orazio Cacciola
description:
Crappy Olympics 

MSX Systems

[Eng]

Here is the Olympic Games of the third millennium, overcome all the proposed disciplines and become the new champion.

[Ita]

Ecco a voi i giochi olimpici del terzo millennio, supera tutte le discipline proposte e diventa il nuovo campione.
